verses.roman:
tāte bhāse māyā lañā ananta brahmāṇḍa
gaḍa-khāite bhāse yena rāi-pūrṇa bhāṇḍa

synonyms: tāte—in that water; bhāse—floats; māyā—the material energy; lañā—taking; ananta—unlimited; brahmāṇḍa—universes; gaḍa-khāite—in the surrounding water; bhāse—floats; yena—as if; rāi-pūrṇa bhāṇḍa—a pot filled with mustard seeds.
translation: "Māyā and her unlimited material universes are situated in that Causal Ocean. Indeed, māyā appears to be floating like a pot filled with mustard seeds.
